message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $115. I think you'll find it very valuable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $100.
I understand your counteroffer, Bob, but I can't let go of the product for less than $110. It's a steal at that price.
I see that you're firm on your price of $110, Alice. I respect that. I'd like to make one final counteroffer of $105.
